messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Re: papering tsuba -- NTHK 2003 shinsa
messages.msgSnippet: Still a bit early to have anything nailed down. Gordon ... From: alchemyst [mailto:alchemyst@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 22, 2003 6:44 AM To:
messages.messageBody:
Still a bit early to have anything nailed down.



Gordon



-----Original Message-----
From: alchemyst [mailto:alchemyst@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 22, 2003 6:44 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: papering tsuba -- NTHK 2003 shinsa




> an alternative to sending to NBTHK shinsa ( postage/insurance,
agent's fee,
> shinsa fee etc could run to 400 just for hozon paper) is to wait for
the NTHK
> shinsa in LA 2004.
>
> Milt


How about someone posting some info on this 2004 LA shinsa please.
I've heard no details of any kind; who, what, where, when????

Rich

messages.msgSnippet: Or, don t wait as long and go to the 2003 NTHK shinsa in London.  Copies of the event flier are posted in MS Word and text formats in the group files:
messages.messageBody:
Or, don't wait as long and go to the 2003 NTHK shinsa in London. Copies of the event flier are posted in MS Word and text formats in the group files:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/files/

Jim


gang,
an alternative to sending to NBTHK shinsa ( postage/insurance, agent's fee,
shinsa fee etc could run to 400 just for hozon paper) is to wait for the NTHK
shinsa in LA 2004.

Milt
